text: LUCASFILM Ltd
Rey stands in the desert.
original_texts: Rey stands in the desert, wearing a light colored robe over white pants

text: Rey is looking towards the horizon.
Rey's hand grips her lightsaber. Distant ship.
original_texts: Rey has a holster attached to her waist and grips the lightsaber tightly. A ship flies in the distance.

text: Rey ignites her lightsaber and assumes a fighting stance.
EVERY GENERATION HAS A LEGEND
Rey sprints through the desert, lightsaber flashing, then gloved hands take the controls of a cockpit.
original_texts: Rey runs through the desert, wielding a lightsaber.
Gloved hands grip controls in a cockpit.

text: TIE fighter chases Rey, sand spraying everywhere.
original_texts: A small, TIE fighter-style craft pursues Rey, kicking up sand.

text: Rey flips over the TIE fighter.
original_texts: Rey ignites her blue lightsaber and faces the pursuing TIE fighter.
Rey flips over the TIE fighter as it flies low to the ground.

text: THIS CHRISTMAS
A TIE fighter approaches Rey from behind.
Glowing craft nears hidden mountain city.
original_texts: Dark, misty mountains emerge from the clouds.
A small, glowing vehicle flies through the misty air towards a city nestled among the mountain peaks.

text: Kylo Ren ignites his red lightsaber in a smoky, red-tinged forest. He attacks and kills an unseen enemy
original_texts: Kylo Ren ignites his red lightsaber in a smoky, red-tinged forest.
Kylo Ren attacks and kills an unseen enemy.
Two stormtroopers fire their blasters.

text: Welding sparks on Kylo Ren's damaged helmet. Finn stands on a rocky desert. Close-up of BB-8 with D-O. Poe Dameron and Chewbacca pilot the Millennium Falcon. Lando Calrissian smiles at the controls of the Millennium Falcon. Hyperspace!
original_texts: Close-up of welding sparks on Kylo Ren's damaged helmet.
Finn stands on a rocky desert overlook with another person.
Close-up of BB-8 with D-O.
Poe Dameron and Chewbacca pilot the Millennium Falcon.
Lando Calrissian smiles at the controls of the Millennium Falcon.
The Millennium Falcon jumps to hyperspace.

text: THE SAGA COMES TO AN END
Speeder escapes desert blast! Threepio!
original_texts: Explosion in the desert landscape
A speeder bike emerges from the explosion
C-3PO and an unknown character ride the speeder bike

text: A ship flies through the air, trailing flames.
A pair of hands holds a golden, circular object.
Rey embraces Leia.
Rey stands in a grassy field. C-3PO and Poe Dameron stand behind her.
Rey stands on a grassy shore, facing a rough sea.  A large, partially submerged wreckage resembling a spacecraft is visible in the water.
original_texts: Rey stands on a grassy shore, facing a rough sea.  A large, partially submerged wreckage resembling a spacecraft is visible in the water.  A man stands behind her.
The wreckage is revealed to be the ruins of the Death Star.

text: Rey ignites her lightsaber, deflecting shots from a training remote.
original_texts: Rey ignites her lightsaber.
She begins practicing lightsaber combat.
A training remote fires at Rey.
Rey deflects the training remote's shots using her lightsaber.

text: STAR WARS
THE RISE OF SKYWALKER
DECEMBER
